title: Hello Team, May i know what can be the reason behind unexpected of my Pixel 4A while charging ?
content:
I purchased google Pixel 4A  before a day ago.

Issues as below :
1)
Power was at 6% when I unboxed it, after plugged in charge i observed it was around 78%.
Suddenly it went to 23%.
So, I rebooted mobile and again charging was 77%.

2)
It got rebooted unexpectedly twice in one hour when mobile was in charging.
Note : No additional app installed, 113 GB space available.

Stores are not open, where should I replace my mobile ?
